name: FantasyFour
description:
Avoid the goblins in this upbeat multi-choice quiz game where you fight to the very end!

You only have so long to answer each question and avoid falling to the goblins who want you to fail. The questions, aimed at the ages of 9 and 10, will improve mental maths skills and you will walk away feeling like a champion.

Movement: W,A,S,D or arrow keys and space bar to attack.

Be stood in the corner with the right answer when the timer runs out to earn points.

Music - Yakov Golman
